trans-unit.source: Provides parsing support for all ASP.NET mobile controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供所有 ASP.NET Mobile 控制項的剖析支援。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The class object is internally created and used by the page parser when parsing a mobile control.
trans-unit.target: 在內部建立並剖析行動控制項時，頁面剖析器使用的類別物件。

trans-unit.source: Mobile controls that implement their own custom persistence must use a control builder that inherits from <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControlBuilder> class.
trans-unit.target: 行動控制項實作自己的自訂持續性，必須使用控制項產生器，繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControlBuilder>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControlBuilder> class implements the following persistence behavior:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControlBuilder>類別會實作下列的持續性行為：

trans-unit.source: Ignores white space directly inside the control.
trans-unit.target: 會忽略控制項內部的空白字元。

trans-unit.source: Recognizes <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific> objects.
trans-unit.target: 會辨識<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific>物件。

trans-unit.source: Enforces that forms are at the top level.
trans-unit.target: 會強制執行形式是最上層。

trans-unit.source: Enforces that style sheets are at the top level.
trans-unit.target: 會強制執行樣式表位於最上層。

trans-unit.source: Enforces that styles are in style sheets.
trans-unit.target: 會強制執行樣式的樣式表中。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControlBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControlBuilder" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether white space literals are permitted in the content between a control's opening and closing tags.
trans-unit.target: 判斷控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容是否允許空白字元常值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The tag name of the child.
trans-unit.target: 子系的標記名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of attributes contained in the child control.
trans-unit.target: 子控制項內含的屬性陣列。

trans-unit.source: Obtains the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the control type corresponding to a child tag.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應到子標記之控制項類型的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the specified control's child.
trans-unit.target: 所指定控制項子系的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。
